SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.mapper

Interface NotificationMapper

public interface NotificationMapper
MapStruct mapper interface for converting between NotificationEntity and NotificationDTO.

Features:

  • Automatic mapping between entity and DTO, including sender and recipient fields
  • Custom mapping for user ID to UserEntity for sender and recipient fields
  • Mapping from MessageDTO to NotificationEntity for message notifications
  • After-mapping logic to set default values for read status and timestamp

Usage: This interface is implemented automatically by MapStruct at build time. Inject or obtain an instance via CDI or the generated implementation for use in your service layer.

  • Method Details

    • toDto

      NotificationDTO toDto(NotificationEntity entity)
      Maps a NotificationEntity to a NotificationDTO.

      Maps sender and user (recipient) to their respective DTOs using UserMapper.

      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped DTO, or null if input is null

    • toEntity

      NotificationEntity toEntity(NotificationDTO dto)
      Maps a NotificationDTO to a NotificationEntity.
      Parameters:
      dto - the DTO to convert
      Returns:
      the mapped entity, or null if input is null

    • fromMessageDTO

      NotificationEntity fromMessageDTO(MessageDTO messageDTO, int unreadCount)
      Creates a NotificationEntity from a MessageDTO and unread count.

      Sets sender and user (recipient) from their IDs, sets type to MESSAGE, and sets default values.

      Parameters:
      messageDTO - the message DTO to convert
      unreadCount - the number of unread messages
      Returns:
      the mapped notification entity

    • mapRecipientIdToUser

      default UserEntity mapRecipientIdToUser(Long recipientId)
      Helper method to map a recipient user ID to a UserEntity reference.
      Parameters:
      recipientId - the recipient user ID
      Returns:
      a UserEntity with the given ID, or null if recipientId is null

    • mapSenderIdToUser

      default UserEntity mapSenderIdToUser(Long senderId)
      Helper method to map a sender user ID to a UserEntity reference.
      Parameters:
      senderId - the sender user ID
      Returns:
      a UserEntity with the given ID, or null if senderId is null

      default void setDefaultValues(NotificationEntity entity)
      After-mapping logic to set default values for read status and timestamp if not set.
